question: Write a letter to your local council that the road in front of your house is damaged.In your letter, you should:tell him your name and where you are livingdescribe the problemsuggest what you want him to do for it.
text: I hereby request renovation services for the road in front of my house as it was broken because of the rain last year and I hope you will be able to support on this issue.

I am a resident of JMD Gardens, Block 6, Lane 11, and living here with my family since 2013 because this is a comfortable area provided with all services. However, since last year the street was damaged and no clear route is available because of heavy rainfall. Furthermore, there are a lot of deep holes and this is causing various accidents daily.
Therefore, it  is a humble request to repair the road as soon as possible because the last incident was harsh and one person died in the car accident.
I would appreciate it if you could help with this issue and raise it to the engineering department to start working on it.
I hope for a positive response from your department on this issue.
